name: Special Containment Procedure
description:
Special Containment Procedure is a fan-made SCP game. Based on the SCP foundation & SCP containment breach, We want to make a survival horror style game, but, with a story! When you download Special Containment Procedure, you gain access to the single-player story mode (huge map & captivating story) & the multiplayer mod (when it will come out)!

Storyline: You are a scientist working at a secret foundation. Your job is to make some tests on creatures & objects to find anything useful about them. You wake up one morning & start your day as usual when suddenly, a power cut creates a containment breach. You will have to do anything in your power to get out of this facility &, more importantly, get out of this facility alive.

-Official discord for news & announcement: https://discord.gg/g9D9HUT
